en.today: The Gemini moon sharpens your perspective, dear Aries, helping you ask the right questions. Make peace with what you do not know, and don't be afraid to admit when you're wrong. An unbalanced aspect with Mercury could brew frustrations with companions who don't show the same level of accountability, but try not to be reactive if you recognize these behaviors in others. Conversations flow in and out as the hours pass, and you'll encounter juicy tidbits of information from peers. Just remember not to act before you have all the facts, while Luna and Mars align this evening.
